title: Should Towers be a bit more Tanky
body:
i personally think towers need a bit more health to drag out out lol Games due to most only being 30-35 mins long 
just want to know what anyone else thinks ?

replies.body: Mage especially karthus have a hard time taking down towers with auto attacks and you suggest we make turrets tankier ? I think this is a bad idea.
I suggest the outer towers dont change so that mages can still win their lanes. but make the in him/nexus turrets much tanker, because snowball teams of AD champs just melt both of them in seconds.
that's the point if you let a trist snow ball then you have lost that's it. That's how the game has been made
yep cos we all like the 50 min long games
